snippet.title: Xeno Shooter Trailer
snippet.description:
Xeno Shooter Trailer Brazilian Indie Game

Game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1452900/Xeno_Shooter/

Xeno Shooter is a action shooter arena game!

You play as a space cadet who travels to Andromeda with the mission of defeating the Primordials and thus, achieving a new home for humanity.

The game have internal achievments.

This is a short game with challenging arenas, some platform stages and some bosses in an retro pixelart. We hope you enjoy your adventure in Andromeda and manage to defeat all 4 Primordials! Good Luck! :)
